'''"A Portrait of Paimon, the Greatest Companion"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "A Portrait of Paimon, the Greatest Companion" is obtained after completing the {{Quest|The Shadows Deepen}}.
